Pricing

Let's build a website you love

In short, we build awesome branded websites backed by social media for businesses like you.

We believe in straight-forward answers you can count on. No hidden costs. No vague contracts. Know what you’re paying for and know where your hard-earned money is going. Transparent as a window.

Subscription

Starting at $400/mo.

Pay for you services as you go. We’re not afraid of a long-term relationship. Don’t worry ever again about keeping your site up to date or trying to make a flyer in Microsoft word, Skymouse handles your marketing for you and let’s you focus on what you love.

Projects

Our Tier system helps you figure out what type of website you need.

$8,000 - $12,000

Craft a website you love.

Craft a website that impresses your wife.

Elite

$50,000 - up

Craft a website that impresses your mother-in-law.
